title: Message to Charles M. Schwab on His 70th Birthday.
text:
My dear Mr. Schwab: I hear that you will reach your seventieth birthday on February 18th.

I wish to add my congratulations to the many others you will receive on that day and I wish you many more such anniversaries. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Mr. Charles M. Schwab, 25 Broadway, New York City]
